dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: I don't see any terrorists.

dataList.title: K Corp. Laboratory
dataList.content: Relax. I've brought plenty of regeneration ampules, so those murder machines can rampage all they want.
An ominous noise buzzed from the stopped machines.

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: Alright, all... You hear me?

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: I got pretty mad thinking you might have thought we ran off, so I'm sending you a message verbally.

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: I'm about to tell you something real important, so listen up.

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: A pause to rouse tension... Good.

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: It's that you are...

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: You are a bunch of worthless worms.

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: Yeah, that's right. You're just worms!
Gimme a break. I was all ears for this load of nonsense.
Gregor approached the speaker wtih a grumble, scratching the back of his head.
<Wait, Gregor!>
After playing the voice, the machine suddenly starts to heat up and inflate.
The machine is heating to unnatural degrees, its components expanding.

dataList.title: Rosespanner Workshop
dataList.content: Oh my, it really is. That's a telltale sign of an imminent explosion.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Indeed, and that means...
Wait a moment! Get away from that damned machine!
Heathcliff kicked Gregor away from the machine.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Hmm... They must've used what little time they had to place traps like this.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Their dedication is admirable. I'm raring to see the mastermind behind this.
<Are all researchers like that? This really doesn't feel like the time for admirations.>
Such is our fate.
